wiki.summary: Cover of The Cure's - Lovesong

track.name: Lovesong
comments: as covers go this is definately up there with the original if not better!!!

don't know the original... but can relate to the comments below about our 'sacred artist' , those who shouldn't be touched.  i am the same way about Prince :)

I enjoy Adele's voice tho - <3

Lots of people have murdered some 80's songs lately (the worst being the Talk Talk remakes). She actually does a nice job with this song. The first time I heard this version was on our old jazz station in town, and it took me a minute to realize it was an old Cure song.

KILL IT!!! KILL IT WITH FIRE!!! Seriously though, I can respect her musical ability, but I'm tired of hearing her everywhere I go, and I can't express through polite words how much I abhore that she was allowed near this song.

I don't have anything against Adele, and though I am a massive Cure fangirl I don't feel like no one should be allowed to cover them / this song (I *love* Jack Off Jill's cover of Lovesong), but this really isn't very good at all. Ugh.
This is great, and despite the fact that it is in my library, I don't remember playing it before.
Very nice song, most of her songs  I like. Usually I like the older song of the 50's and 60's.
One of a few of adele's tracks i like.

I will always love you .. always, always <33

#BeautifulVoice
